description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved drawings) for Application Reference Number: 23/01714/FUL (Erection of a three-storey detached dwelling together with new vehicular access, associated parking and landscaping.) dated 12/01/2024. Variations to consist of the relocation of attached garage from eastern to western side elevation, internal alterations to the accommodation layout, alterations to the footprint of dwelling, alterations to the elevations and fenestration, alterations to the roof profile, and reduction of accommodation at second floor level.
